name: Vicewave
storyline: A 20-year-old boy named James Bernett is a ghetto boy with ambitions who wants to get everything from the world at once. James became a criminal early on in his pocket thefts. After another unsuccessful case, Uncle Raph offers him to join the gang, in the ranks of which his father was a member. From that moment on, James is no longer a street thug, but a gangster who performs tasks for the Escapeta gang boss. Very soon, he will create his own criminal empire, built on the sale of drugs and become the most influential drug baron in the city of Los Riveros!
